name: Brutus
description: A valiant warrior who is indomitable in the front line.

ultimate.name: Whirlwind Wrath
ultimate.description: Brutus spins Mountain's Roar at high speed and deals 110% damage every second to adjacent enemies within 1 tile for 4s. He is unaffected while spinning.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 120%.
Brutus is immune to control effects while spinning. This skill's duration stacks with the duration of his other damage immunities.

skill_1.name: Ferocious Roar
skill_1.description: Brutus roars with rage, taunting surrounding enemies within 2 tiles for 1.5s and reducing their Phys DEF by 15% for 9s.

upgrades.upgrade: Reduces surrounding enemies' Phys DEF by 20%.
Reduces surrounding enemies' Phys DEF by 25%.

skill_2.name: Indomitable
skill_2.description: Brutus is immune to the first fatal blow he receives. He is then immune to all damage and bcomes unaffcted for 5s.

upgrades.upgrade: Immunity grants 25 Life Drain and 25% ATK.
Immunity grants 35 Life Drain and 30% ATK.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Brutus increases his Life Drain by 10 during battle. He gains an extra 5 Life Drain during his Ultimate.

ex_skill.name: Cleaving Strike
ex_skill.description: Brutus cleaves with all his might to enemies within 1-tile arc in front after receiving physical damage 10 times from adjacent enemies, dealing 200% damage plus 12% of the target's max HP. The total damage cannot exceed 750% of his ATK. Brutus also gains 30% Life Drain. This skill can be triggered once every 5s.

enhance_force.description: The duration of damage and control immunity from Indomitable is increased by 1s.
